mapper.insert: insert into template (name, barCode, price, isMetal, weight, posNum, status, description, createdDate, createdBy, modifiedDate, modifiedBy) values (#{name}, #{barCode}, #{price}, #{isMetal}, #{weight}, #{posNum}, #{status}, #{description}, #{createdDate}, #{createdBy}, #{modifiedDate}, #{modifiedBy})
insert into templatePosMap (templateId, posOrder, xPos, yPos) values (#{templateId}, #{posOrder}, #{xPos}, #{yPos})
mapper.select: select * from templatePosMap where templateId=#{templateId} order by posOrder asc
